title: Um, help?

replies.body:
What exactly is going wrong that's not letting you play? 41-51 Ping isn't too bad, and that small increase could just be due to ISP traffic around that time of day.

Let me know what kind of problems you're having that make it so you can't play.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=VToEEi3E,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-05T23:13:33.476+0000)

> What exactly is going wrong that's not letting you play? 41-51 Ping isn't too bad, and that small increase could just be due to ISP traffic around that time of day.
> 
> Let me know what kind of problems you're having that make it so you can't play.

Around 10-15-20 minutes in, I get the "Trying to reconnect..." message, sometimes I don't even load in. (This also has happend to me when in custom games, Idk why...) Kinda afraid of getting Leaverbuster, so I stopped playing. I sent a Support Ticket, but I have yet to get a respone from Riot. Again, I've tried using the Hextech Repair Tool, it STILL didn't work after reinstalling League. My Ping is NEVER high unless my game is kinda delayed. This happend a game RIGHT AFTER winning a game of Xayah, once I started playing her again with my friends, this stuff began happening. All help will be appreciated, thanks in advance. <3

Hmmmmmm so the way you mention it, it kinda sounds like this is only happening when you play as Xayah maybe? There's a chance this might be related to missing or damaged game files for her, so try running a quick repair to see if that helps and test it in a custom/practice match to avoid any possible leaverbusters. 

If that doesn't do the trick, be sure to check back on your ticket with the techs, they should be able to look through your game logs to see exactly what's going wrong.
